name: Calm Time
description:
Calm Time is an experiment game created by the fusion of Revolab, Ivan Zanotti's MyMadness Works and Bellini Virgil. "Calm Time" was developed in one Week for GameJolt Contest 10 and probably has some bugs in it: feel free to leave a comment in the case some bugs happens in your playthrough.

The game is really simple and a bit slow: just follow the in-game text and enjoy the short experience.

Thanks for playing!

CONTROLS

WASD to move
E to interact
CTRL to calm yourself
Left click to interact in a different way
